urlset:
{{ baseurl }}/ hourly 0.8
{{ baseurl }}/plans/ monthly
{{ baseurl }}/tour/ weekly
{{ baseurl }}/tour/organizations weekly
{{ baseurl }}/tour/features weekly
{{ baseurl }}/tour/enterprise weekly
{{ baseurl }}/contact/ monthly
{{ baseurl }}/about/ monthly
{{ baseurl }}/security/ monthly 0.4
{{ baseurl }}/tos monthly 0.4
{{ baseurl }}/privacy monthly 0.4
{% for namespace, reponame in public_repos -%}
{{ baseurl }}/repository/{{ namespace }}/{{ reponame }} daily 0.3
{%- endfor %}
